short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A game of space invaders to deal with your browser tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Got so many tabs open that you can't see them anymore? This extension gamifies closing them. Each alien you destroy in a game of space invaders will close an associated tab.
